website_summaries.verdict: A waterproof hiking boot that you can take on long trips right out of the box without having to worry about blisters.
pros: These lightweight and waterproof boots offer excellent support for your foot and ankle

customer_reviews.title: So Far, So Good!
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. My wife likes the look and feel and they fit well. She normally wears a 7 1/2 and has a wide foot. She ordered an 8 wide and they fit just right. Bought them due to good reviews on comfort and waterproofing. Will be testing them soon on an African photo safari in damp conditions. Will update when we know more!
customer_reviews.author: Agentden

customer_reviews.title: Love these boots!
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots! Comfortable! Kept my feet warm and dry! I walked on uneven trails and these boots kept me from slipping or stumbling. Love them! Plan to buy more footwear from this company, as a result of how pleased I am by the construction! Worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: XenaWP

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful boots, it you have wide feet get the ...
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful boots, it you have wide feet get the wide. I had a pair for 10 years and they are still comfortable. Only hiking boots I've ever had that first hike they didn't give me a blister. Just as happy with these new ones
customer_reviews.author: Catheirne

customer_reviews.title: Excellant, and well made shoe.  Such a great shoe with great ankle support.
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are really amazing! I love them, and I am so happy to have them. Since I hurt my knee last summer I have really had a tough time. These shoes with their Vibram sole are giving my entire posture support, and my knee feels a thousand times better. I love them. They are very well made, and I like to wear them everyday. Get a good sock to go with them. They have good toe room.
customer_reviews.author: CASurfergirl

customer_reviews.title: easy walks. No breaking-in period was required
customer_reviews.text: Have only had them about a month and used them on a few, easy walks. No breaking-in period was required. I normally wear a 9 or 9-1/2 W shoe and have difficulty with bunions. I ordered a 10W to allow for a heavier sock, and they fit perfectly. Am very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Connie

customer_reviews.title: They appear sturdy and well made
customer_reviews.text: I tend to run through a pair of hiking boots with a year. I have never strayed from Merrells but after wearing these for one day... I am impressed. i hope they last longer than one season! They appear sturdy and well made. Vibram sole!
customer_reviews.author: Tia B

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots. Fit is great and they are actually waterproof
customer_reviews.author: 6shaddog

customer_reviews.title: Great Outdoor and Hiking Shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quality shoe for hiking and outdoor purposes. They came with a little scuff in the suede on the side of shoe but nothing major. Also came with a different pair of laces! My girlfriend is overall very pleased with these!
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Wachholz

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Felt pretty comfortable, but not quite what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Kendra Vandergaag

customer_reviews.title: Love this boot
customer_reviews.text: Love this boot. I have no idea why everyone is saying it is too large, I went off of others' reviews and ordered half a size up and it was massive so I exchanged for my size which is still pretty loose! Going to try it with an insole and see how it fits but I would go off of the website's measurements because despite my wide food these were huge! Great boot in other regards.
customer_reviews.author: molly

customer_reviews.title: Not a size wide.
customer_reviews.text: The boots were not wide enough. They fit like a regular size.
customer_reviews.author: Maralene Rose Roush

customer_reviews.title: nice, but narrow.
customer_reviews.text: Runs narrow. I ordered the wides, but the sides of my foot keep rubbing inside the shoe. Luckily my mom has less wide feet so I gave them to her! The toe box is somewhat smaller than other hiking shoes I've tried on. They are very very cute though (for a pair of hiking boots)!
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are my go-to shoes for hiking, especially in marshy areas. Looking forward to lots of use!
customer_reviews.author: CJB

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit for wide feet
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots. This is my 4th pair of Vazque boots. I have a wide foot and it is difficult to find boots that fit properly. These are comfortable from the first minute.
customer_reviews.author: jgrace8702

customer_reviews.title: Love this hiking shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love this hiking shoes. Would buy them again when time to replacement comes. They fit great from day one as if they were already broken in.
customer_reviews.author: Liliana

customer_reviews.title: Narrow even in the wide width
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love these boots, but they were way too narrow even in the wide width. I was so excited to find a boot that offered wide sizes, and I loved the look of these boots but I had to return them. Other than the weird sizing, the boots do seem to be high quality. Bummed they didn't work out.
customer_reviews.author: Tessa P.

customer_reviews.title: They fit perfectly and are incredibly comfortable. I will buy these again
customer_reviews.text: First time wearing them was hiking in Hawaii. Walked through water, mud, steep inclines and rocks. They fit perfectly and are incredibly comfortable. I will buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy Stack

customer_reviews.title: ... hike yet I have worn them around the house like I usually do and they feel great
customer_reviews.text: Though I haven't actually worn these on a hike yet I have worn them around the house like I usually do and they feel great. I first bought my size an 8 and found it a little snug so after checking out the helpful reviews I exchanged them for a 8 1/2 wide, which is not really the usual wide but is snug and comfortable and foots doesn't move around inside the shoe. I love the color and the style is well designed. I have tried on half a dozen other hiking boots and returned but these are the ones!
customer_reviews.author: kat

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots. They felt comfortable from the first time wearing them.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Marsh

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love them. I wore them all day thinking they ...
customer_reviews.text: My first pair of Vasque hiking shoes. Absolutely love them. I wore them all day thinking they would need breaking in. Wasn't necessary, they were perfect!
customer_reviews.author: JH

customer_reviews.title: Will look into getting a men's boot as I love the quality
customer_reviews.text: Returned them as they are too small / narrow. Will look into getting a men's boot as I love the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: My ankles are sore, but I'm still trying to break them in. As expected.
customer_reviews.author: Kelley Caston

customer_reviews.title: Wife's Way Boot
customer_reviews.text: my wife really likes these boots. They fit her great, have aggressive tread which grip and track great, and she likes how stylish they are!
customer_reviews.author: Rhett Kopp

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: The Vasque Woman's Talus Ultradry hiking boot in the wide width was very narrow. I had to return them.
customer_reviews.author: Chadeayne Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: I returned them because they rubbed on inside of ball of foot.
customer_reviews.author: Karen L. Ault

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable hiking boots, good looking and not too heavy. Like them so much.
customer_reviews.author: Resse

customer_reviews.title: 100% waterproof
customer_reviews.text: I bought these boots 6 years ago, 100% water proof. Best boots I have ever had
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Vasque Women's Talus Ultradry Hiking Boot
product_meta.description: At Vasque, they are committed to making functional, innovative and aesthetic footwear that performs to the highest standards. Their ultimate goal is to make shoes that inspire you to get outdoors and embark on an adventure. Incorporating and developing new and innovative technologies into their boots is what keeps Vasque at the top of their game.
feature_bullets: Perpetuum Last with broad toe box
